name: Uluru Shoe
description:
Single sandal
Yulara Township, NT, Australia
11 April 2021

Dawn's early light revealed the sandal, a ship wreck stranded on a red dust reef. Upturned and prone, it pointed to the rock, a signpost to unfulfilled ambition tinged with regret. Neville, weary of the view, returned to the bistro, his compôte of fruit beckoning. 

-----

The Lost Shoe Project brings together participants from around the world, in a performance piece documented in close-to-real-time as a sequence of photographic images of lost or abandoned shoes. The Collector presents this first array of his most loved images. 

https://lostshoeproject.art
